rules: Rule1: Either the research team discovers an ancient relic, or they do not have government grant funding
Rule2: The research team either identifies ceramic fragments among the materials or identifies metal objects among the materials
Rule3: Should the research team identify metal objects among the materials, then they complete their research within the time period
Rule4: When the research team documents findings in the field journal, then they preserve the excavation site
Rule5: Under the condition that identifying ceramic fragments does not lead to documenting findings, then the research team halts the excavation
Rule6: Given that identifying ceramic fragments does not result in documenting findings, then the research team does not halt the excavation
Rule7: If the research team does not complete their research within the time period, then they have government grant funding
facts: Fact1: The research team does not discover an ancient relic
Fact2: The research team does not preserve the excavation site

question: The research team completes their research within the time period
